name: h3
description: The 2025 Mizuno CRBN Pro Drop 8 USSSA Baseball Bat is a top-tier choice for serious players seeking the perfect blend of power and precision. Designed with a drop 9 length-to-weight ratio, this bat is certified with USSSA 1.15BPF NTS, ensuring compliance and high performance on the field. Its two-piece composite construction features a 2 1/4 inch barrel diameter, making it ideal for both contact and power hitters. The striking white, black, and sunrise colorway enhances its visual appeal, while the Dual Frequency Dampener minimizes vibrations for a smoother swing. Additional features like Cylinder Seaming and Black Onyx Carbon provide consistency and durability, while the Optimized End Cap and Speed Helix Grip enhance comfort and deliver an impressive pop with every hit. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
